Did you hear about the %2$s %1$s? Oh man, %1$s got the most high-paying Android dev job at GEEKLE! %1$s is living the rock star life: a penthouse apartment in %3$s, has about %4$s cars to drive around in, a private jet and even a pet %5$s! Well, that last part might be a rumor but %1$s really worked their %6$s off to get to where they are. It\'s like Bill Gates always said: \n\"Always trust your %7$s instinct!\"
Welcome to the MadLibs app! \nPlease enter the corresponding user input to receive an \nawesome story at the end!
